item.description:
The Jacob Wirth Restaurant has been a Boston favorite since 1868.
Conveniently located in the heart of the city?s theater district, Jake Wirth?s is a ?Best of Boston? award winner, a classic European dining room with a contemporary American flair. Its menu ranges from traditional German specialties to current American favorites, with highlights that include award-winning New England Clam Chowder.
Jake Wirth?s historic bar is a popular destination in itself, with dozens of imported beers on draft and a rich wine list. And Friday nights are extra special, with fun-filled piano sing-alongs that have become a festive weekend tradition in the bar area.
Eat, drink and be merry as you sing along to your favorites. No problem if you don't know the words. You'll get a free songbook with lyrics to more than 500 songs.

Parking is available next door, with two hours free for restaurant patrons.
Also, please be sure to bring cash to make it easy on settling the bill with the group.

Here is a link to the website. Check it out! The history of the restaurant is very interesting!
http://www.jacobwirth...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be out front of the restaurant just before 7:30pm with a meet up sign. If you come later, look for a meet up sign on the tables.
item.why: Good friends, good food, good music!

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner & Friday Night Sing-a-Long at Jacob Wirth German Restaurant
